html: He did know he was the subject of a criminal obstruction investigation. There is a lot of contortion around the obstruction decision.
text: He did know he was the subject of a criminal obstruction investigation. There is a lot of contortion around the obstruction decision.

html: It’s odd to refuse to charge the President or his circle because they were unaware of the illegality of their collusive conduct, & then protect him from obstruction charges on grounds of intent b/c he had committed no underlying Russia conspiracy crime, something he did not know.
text: It’s odd to refuse to charge the President or his circle because they were unaware of the illegality of their collusive conduct, & then protect him from obstruction charges on grounds of intent b/c he had committed no underlying Russia conspiracy crime, something he did not know.

html: Only fearful subordinates prevented his efforts at actual obstruction under criminal law.
text: Only fearful subordinates prevented his efforts at actual obstruction under criminal law.

html: The President’s conduct regarding the investigation manifestly violates any fealty to rule of law, & more closely resembles deliberate efforts to interfere & obstruct, akin to banana republic governance.
text: The President’s conduct regarding the investigation manifestly violates any fealty to rule of law, & more closely resembles deliberate efforts to interfere & obstruct, akin to banana republic governance.

html: Unless you are up against a charging deadline, time is not ordinarily such a priority over accuracy and completeness as to the central element of the charge.
text: Unless you are up against a charging deadline, time is not ordinarily such a priority over accuracy and completeness as to the central element of the charge.

html: Concerns about delay as an excuse for not interviewing the President seem ill-founded, given the lengthy negotiations resulting in no subpoena & the value of accuracy and completeness in criminal investigations.
text: Concerns about delay as an excuse for not interviewing the President seem ill-founded, given the lengthy negotiations resulting in no subpoena & the value of accuracy and completeness in criminal investigations.

html: Despite the centrality of intent to this determination, the President was not subpoenaed or interviewed.
text: Despite the centrality of intent to this determination, the President was not subpoenaed or interviewed.

html: The report’s obstruction decision was influenced by the OLC policy that a sitting president cannot be indicted, a policy not tested in the judicial branch. Even thus, the President could not be exonerated.
text: The report’s obstruction decision was influenced by the OLC policy that a sitting president cannot be indicted, a policy not tested in the judicial branch. Even thus, the President could not be exonerated.

html: The redacted report references 14 other investigations & includes over 400 redactions that signal ongoing investigative matters. The ongoing investigations reach very close to Trump and his circle, including right into his Trump Tower personal office, so clearly this is not over.

html: The report chronicles a sordid tale of low-life behavior, with Trump & his associates engaging in all manner of legally and ethically dubious behavior; & has so far produced 200 criminal charges, 37 indictments, & 8 convictions – including Donald Trump's former campaign manager.

html: The Supporting and Treating Officers In Crisis Act will: Restore grant funding for family-support services for police officers and Allow grant recipients to use funds to create suicide-prevention programs and mental health services for law enforcement officers.
text:
The Supporting and Treating Officers In Crisis Act will:

 Restore grant funding for family-support services for police officers and
 Allow grant recipients to use funds to create suicide-prevention programs and mental health services for law enforcement officers.

text:
Offut Air Force Base, NE, is the headquarters of USSTRATCOM.
@DeptofDefense did consider Offut in their reports.

It was not considered a top ten risk.
It is currently underwater.pic.twitter.com/jxP719UOJR

html: Tyndall Air Force Base, FL, hosted the 325th Fighter Wing and 55 F-22 Raptors. After Hurricane Michael, 95% of its buildings were damaged or destroyed. @DeptofDefense didn’t consider it, either.pic.twitter.com/ptlgUsYk0r

1. Climate change is real
2. It's caused by humans
3. Congress needs to act

html: The scientists at @oldweather have a really cool project going, and they need your help! Watch to learn more.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3wL9Q_puFak&feature=youtu.be …

html: Congress passed the #EqualPay Act more than 50 years ago—but the sad reality is that today—women, on average, still only make 80 cents for every dollar men make. For women of color—the pay gap is even worse. #PaycheckFairnesspic.twitter.com/ypt8WCnrCj

html: As we begin #BlackHistoryMonth, I am proud to share the dialogue I had with @RepRichmond where we explored our past as well as the history we are creating together. For as George Santayana once said, "those who cannot remember the past are condemned to repeat it."pic.twitter.com/mCxOk33Whe
